title: 6 Spring Essentials in Zoë Kravitz’s Timeless Cool-Girl Wardrobe
description: She’s the queen of effortless dressing.
excerpt: She’s the queen of effortless dressing.
text: When Zoë Kravitz was announced as the March cover star for ELLE, fans went wild. And rightfully so. Her effortless sense of style has held many of us in a sartorial chokehold over the years.What is it that makes every outfit she wears seem abnormally cool without that ‘trying too hard’ look? Well, a big portion of it is certainly intrinsic. I mean, her parents are two of the most captivating people on this planet. But it also helps that she’s never been a huge trend follower. Instead, her wardrobe is strengthened by styling tried-and-true essentials in a refreshing way. The proof is in the photos. Below, you’ll see that for over a decade she has anchored her closet with cool-girl staples that never go out of style. As you start planning your wardrobe refresh this spring, discover all of the sartorial secret weapons in Kravitz’s vault, ahead.The Spring SkirtMEGARobert KamauThe tried-and-true silk maxi has been a staple in Kravitz’s wardrobe for years. html:
When Zoë Kravitz was announced as the March cover star for ELLE, fans went wild. And rightfully so. Her effortless sense of style has held many of us in a sartorial chokehold over the years.

What is it that makes every outfit she wears seem abnormally cool without that ‘trying too hard’ look? Well, a big portion of it is certainly intrinsic. I mean, her parents are two of the most captivating people on this planet. But it also helps that she’s never been a huge trend follower. Instead, her wardrobe is strengthened by styling tried-and-true essentials in a refreshing way. The proof is in the photos. Below, you’ll see that for over a decade she has anchored her closet with cool-girl staples that never go out of style. As you start planning your wardrobe refresh this spring, discover all of the sartorial secret weapons in Kravitz’s vault, ahead.

The Spring Skirt

The tried-and-true silk maxi has been a staple in Kravitz’s wardrobe for years. Follow her lead and wear yours with a tank top on warm spring days.

Favorite Daughter The Fancy Favorite Semi-Sheer Maxi Skirt

Simkhai Kiri satin maxi skirt in blue - Simkhai

The Sei Silk Satin Maxi Skirt

The Row Irene Silk Midi Skirt

The Transitional Jacket

When it’s chilly in the morning and sizzling hot in the afternoon, a lightweight jacket is essential. For those unpredictable spring days, Kravitz has turned to an expertly crafted denim jacket over and over again.

Madewell Relaxed Crop Jean Trucker Jacket

Ruadh The Remi Denim Jacket

Wardrobe.NYC Denim Jacket

Balenciaga Denim Small Fit Jacket

The LBD

The most quintessential piece in Kravitz’s closet is the little black dresses. It’s a failsafe for any engagements on the calendar, so you can never own too many. Dress it up with heels or channel your inner cool girl and wear yours with a T-shirt layered underneath.

H&M Tie-Detail Slip Dress

Saint Laurent Lace-Trimmed Silk-Satin Midi Dress

Leset Barb Backless Dress

SIR Willa Lace-Trimmed Cutout Silk Maxi Dress

The Straight-Leg Jeans

While some are arguing over baggy versus skinny, Kravitz evaded the trends and played it smart with straight-leg jeans—a style lesson we all can take note of.

Anine Bing Bry Straight Leg

Frame Ruler High-Rise Straight-Leg Jeans

AGOLDE ’90s Pinch Waist High Waist Straight Leg

Zara TRF Straight-Leg Jeans

The Statement Shoes

While her closet might be filled with mostly neutrals, every now and again, Kravitz loves sprinkling a pop of color into her outfits, especially in the shoe department. It’s an easy way to add excitement to a monochrome look or make casual pieces feel polished. Follow her lead and test out a pair of red mules that can be dressed up or down this season.

The Row Milla Flat

Bode Musette Ballerina Flats

Jacquemus Les Doubles Mules

Proenza Schouler Tee Perforated Slingback Pumps- Red

The Staple Saint Laurent Bag

Of course, Kravitz has unlimited access to any brand in the world, but the cool-girl spirit that’s woven into Saint Laurent’s brand ethos perfectly aligns with her carefree attitude. And as the face of the brand, she often anchors her outfits—even the off-duty ones—with a classic designer handbag from the French fashion house.

Saint Laurent Kate Small Tassel Bag

Saint Laurent Mini Pochon Bag

Saint Laurent Y Tote

Saint Laurent Sac Patent Leather Hobo
